body.name: Hot and Cold Bidet Attachment for Toilet, Ultra-Slim Bidet Attachment Warm Water, Non-Electric Adjustable Pressure Self Cleaning Sprayer Nozzle Control for Posterior, Feminine Wash, Easy to Install
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 13 hrs 30 mins
FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 13 hrs 30 mins
features: [Hot and Cold Water] Experience ultimate comfort with our bidet attachment for toilet's smoothing temperature control, allowing you to adjust the water from cool to warm, providing a gentle and refreshing cleaning experience that surpasses traditional toilet paper.

[Dual Wash Mode] Our toilet seat bidet offers dual wash modes. The rear wash mode provides a stronger flow towards the rear. The gentle feminine wash mode offers a softer flow towards the front, and is especially useful during monthly cycles, catering to the unique needs of women.

[360°Self Cleaning Nozzle] You can simply turn to the 360°self-cleaning mode by turning left the front knob after every use of the bidet hot water and automatically retracts when it is turned off. Helps you enjoy a more hygienic and clean washing experience.

[Adjustable Water Pressure & Angle] With an advanced chrome knob, you can adjust the hot and cold bidet by turning right to your preferred water pressure for maximum comfort. And nozzle has an angle controller to adjust the spray angle. Friendly to the disabled, pregnant women, elderly, and children.

[Easy to Install] Quite easily install on most standard two-piece toilets, it only takes several minutes to install. The bidet attachment for toilet requires no special tools, and you can easily mount it under the toilet seat lid in minutes. No plumbers are needed.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: NOTE: 1.If you would like the hot water, you NEED TO CONNECT the bidet to BOTH HOT AND COLD WATER PIPES together to work, if not, PLEASE ORDER WITH CAUTION! 2.If no hot water pipe in your toilet, or you only need cold water, please use the BLACK PLUG NUT included to plug the hot water port of bidet!
Adjust the nozzle to achieve Rear and Frontal modes!

Installation details for the warm water bidet Hot and cold water connection design The design of connecting to hot water allows you to enjoy the highest degree of warm water service, without letting your butt get cold, and better protect the health of women and mothers! Easy to install The bidet attachment for toilet comes with all the premium components and instructions needed for installation. No plumber and special tools required, perfect for most DIYers.

DooLv Bidet Attachment - Your Ideal Choice! Ultra-Slim design Only 0.28 inches thick! It does not affect the height of your toilet seat after installation bidet. Universal fit The bidet attachment perfectly fits standard, elongated, round toilet and more!
Note: Please confirm the size of hot and cold adapter before ordering!
Much More Convenient for Elderly, New Mothers, Women and Kids!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great choice for our home
reviews.reviewText: While going through cancer treatment I was using the bathroom more often than most. My radiologist suggested a bidet that might give me a level of comfort. We have never had one before, so, after doing a lot of research and reading about several options that were available we chose this model for our first ever bidet. I’m happy to say it was very easy to install with the hot and cold water. As others have said, do not over tightened the plastic fittings. Everything went together well. Now that I have this appliance I will never have a bathroom that does not have this on the throne.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Straight to the Bullseye
reviews.reviewText: The price was unbelievably low and it was easy to install. The mechanism was surprisingly on the target. The water came out in a soft gush and was more than adequate in getting the job done. This is a fourth purchase for us of bidets and cannot imagine living without one. This particular model is great because of the price and efficiency!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Take note of where ur toilet is in relation to sink
reviews.reviewText: The downside: Usually with a bidet you connect the cold water to the water supply/pipe for the toilet. But if you want hot water you have to get it from somewhere to hook it up to the bidet. Frequently (and with this product) that requires hooking it up to your sinks hot water. Easy enough? However, as an American our bathrooms can be set up differently where your sink is opposite your toilet. This complicates things bc now you need to run the piping across the middle of the floor to connect. If you want to track the tubing around the perimeter of the bathroom you need to get a longer connector bc the one that comes with this is too short. All things to think about especially if you are a beginner. I bought this and I don’t even use the temperature function. Kind of a waste but I did not return it bc of the below reasons:Regardless this was so easy to install and for the price- it was exactly what I was looking for. It’s super easy to clean and is simple to navigate and use. It’s a good bidet for starters and long time users alike- installed for my mother who has trouble moving around easily. It kept her independent and was easy to learn and get used to.Pro:- good price- easy to install- easy to cleanCon:- unless your sink and toilet are right next to eachother it won’t work- I only am able to use cold water- awkward fit

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It looks just like the picture. Not yet installed.
reviews.reviewText: I do t have anything to say as of yet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy install, warm, and works as intended
reviews.reviewText: My seat doesn't sit quite right on it but it works, easy hook up, warm if you run warm water for a min. At $40 I'd buy this again. YOU DO NEED TO BE CLOSE TO A WARM WATER HOOK UP. worked well for my use case.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fix to my bidet issues
reviews.reviewText: I had ordered a different bidet originally, but it would not fit my toilet correctly. The nozzle protruded an inch and a half into the inside of the toilet seat. I scanned around Amazon and came across this one with excellent reviews. I placed the order and the bidet was at my work location in two days. As I’m installing the bidet I found out that the cold water hose is meant for a standard toilet. Not a toilet on a ship. The hot water hose ran perfectly to my sink, so I emailed customer service. After I explained my situation they immediately and without request, sent the parts I needed to run the cold water hose from the sink as well. They had to ship it to my home, which is fine, I’m heading home this week anyway and can bring the parts back next hitch. I was able to put together a makeshift hose in the mean time just to test the bidet out. And it’s fabulous. Water temp mixture was perfect, spray pressure was easily adjustable and I really like the fact that you can manually aim the nozzle with a toggle type switch. My wife hates the other bidet I have at home because it has an arm that unintentionally actuates the bidet in the middle of the night when she goes to the restroom….. Which can be very intrusive if you don’t know it’s coming. I told her about this one and she insists I get another to replace the bidet at home. Another awesome selling point is that you do not need the big seat risers for this unit. It’s body is slim enough to fit between the seat and the toilet without the need for the risers.This bidet is priced right, works well, fits correctly and has the sellers backing 100% I am extremely happy with the purchase and with the customer service experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I did install several different bedet attachment models A low profile is what is good. Do not need any additional padding on the seat when installed.Downside t connector on cold water base from plastic which feels cheap. The spray control handle is slippery and needs an upgrade.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Purchased two. Installation is straight forward and fittings seem to be satisfactory. No leaks after using for about three weeks and quality is better than expected. We really like the heated water because we live in the country and have our own well. Water temperature out of the tap is about the same as refrigerated so we're happy to have it warmer. Would buy again and have recommended the brand to family members.

The media could not be loaded. I have never had a bidet before. I tried one at my aunts house and thought I have to get one. This bidet has hot and cold water and was a much more affordable option than the actual bidet seat. I use this bidet to the point that I barely use toilet paper and so the bidet has pretty much paid for itself. I don't have issues getting burned by the hot water as I read in some reviews, I really have no complaints at all. The video is of the cleaning feature. This is hands down one of the best purchases I have made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to install and saves a fortune on toilet paper
reviews.reviewText: My girlfriend had a cold water bidet, after getting used to it (even in winter when its a bit of a shock) i realised how much toilet paper i waste.Brought this for my house, and with zero plumbing expertise, installed in 5 minutes. (It's literally 2 pipes that need to be screwed onto the hot and cold valves once you've shut your water off).Easy to use (self explanatory dials), warm water is great for winter and cold good for summer even if you need to freshen up.Well worth the price and you'll get your money back in 6 months from using barely any toilet roll.

reviews.reviewTitle: I want to install one everywhere!
reviews.reviewText: Bidet works amazing, install was simple. Only thing I could say is it would have been nice if the fitting for hot hose would come off so I could have drilled a smaller hole. Other than that no complaints what so ever. Great pressure, and temp control.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great for small bathrooms that cannot have a bidet. This attachment is very good, so hygenic, leaving you feeling fresh. My toilet is not standard, but my handyman was able to make a minor adjustment by cutting a corner slightly for a good fit. It works well.
Easy to install but I wish the jet direction could be bit more adjustable.
